references.paper_title: Making a science of model search: Hyperparameter optimization in hundreds of dimensions for vision architectures
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of hyperparameter optimization, a key area related to Bayesian Optimization (BO) which the main paper addresses.
This paper is one of the few that directly tackles dynamic Bayesian Optimization (DBO), a crucial context for the main paper's contribution.
This paper also directly addresses DBO and proposes ABO, a state-of-the-art method that the main paper improves upon.
This paper is a seminal work in Gaussian Processes (GPs), the core methodology behind Bayesian Optimization that underpins the techniques used in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Efficient global optimization of expensive black-box functions
references.reason: This paper is a foundational contribution to Bayesian Optimization which introduced Efficient Global Optimization (EGO), a highly influential algorithm referenced in the main paper.
